title: Joan Baez
summary: Joan Chandos Baez (/baÉªz/;[1][2] born January 9, 1941)[3] is an American singer, songwriter, musician, and activist.[4] Her contemporary folk music often includes songs of protest and social justice.[5] Baez has performed publicly for over 60 years, releasing over 30 albums. Fluent in Spanish and English, she has also recorded songs in at least six other languages.
